description:
This is a bearing kit for your Ghost Cagua AMR 29.

  • Kit includes: 4 x ball bearing (688-KRR-2RS) Ø8.0 x Ø16,.0 x 7.0mm, 2 x counter sunk screw M5 x 12.0 mm, 2 x axle Ø13 x Ø8 x 20mm, 1 x axle Ø17 x Ø12 x 57.3 mm, 1 x bearing cap Ø25 x Ø9 x 6.2 mm, 1 x counter sunk screw M8 x 23mm, ball bearing (6001) Ø28 x Ø12 x 8mm, 1 x spacer Ø12.2 x Ø17 x 28mm, 1 x counter sunk screw M5 x 16 mm, 2 x special counter sunk screw M8 x 22.5mm, 2 x bearing cap Ø25 x Ø9 x 5.4mm, 4 x ball bearing (608-2RS) Ø22 x Ø8 x 7mm, 2 x threaded sleeve Ø14 x M8xM12 x 9.4mm, 1 x axle Ø13 x Ø8 x 92.7mm,1 x bearing cap Ø25 x Ø8 x 4.2mm, 2 x Spacer Ø19x Ø8 x 2.0mm, 1 x bearing cap Ø25 x Ø5.5x 4.4mm
name: Ghost AMR 29-Cagua Bearing Kit# KE0085
